job.title: Software Engineer Intern (General)
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Financial Services
job.description:
Does starting your career with the world’s leading financial services company excite you? The Experian Internship Program is a unique opportunity to commence your career with a global, fast-growing, innovative company. We have year-round internship opportunities, primarily timed in Summer and Fall.
Experian is the world’s leading global information services company, unlocking the power of data to create more opportunities for consumers, businesses and society. We are thrilled to share that
has named Experian one of
In addition, for the last five years we’ve been name in the
by
We have been rated one of the best Human Resource teams in the US.
During life’s big moments – from buying a home or a car, to sending a child to college, to growing a business by connecting with new customers – we empower consumers and our clients to manage their data with confidence. We help individuals to take financial control and access financial services, businesses to make smarter decisions and thrive, lenders to lend more responsibly, and organizations to prevent identity fraud and crime.
Software Engineer Interns will be concentrating on creating software and applications spanning different types of users, from consumers all the way to the largest financial institutions in the world. They will work with latest technologies and platforms to help leverage Experian’s massive data assets to drive client success. Our Interns are encouraged to make recommendations on new approaches and evaluate different solutions for the new products we seek to build. The candidate must be detail oriented, curious, and able to adapt to business problems in different industries. The candidate must be able to balance multiple concurrent projects, have the ability to prioritize projects, anticipate obstacles, and make high quality deliveries on an aggressive schedule. The candidate must also be a team player that is self-motivated and has excellent communication skills.
Work with a team of developers to bring new products from prototype to production.
Produce efficient and elegant code using programming skills (Java, Python, etc.) to develop new applications. tools.
Identify and translate customer requirements into detailed architecture and design.
Conduct detailed testing, troubleshooting and debugging
Ability to work across a variety of technologies and understand how to apply different tools for new product development
Currently enrolled in a bachelor’s program- Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Software Engineering or related technical discipline.
Proficiency in programming languages including Python, Java or C++
Experience with web applications, web services, and related ecosystem.
Exposure to Big Data, i.e. Hadoop and associated tools would be beneficial.
Ability to comprehend customer and business requirements and translate into workable solutions.
our information will be kept confidential according to EEO guidelines.
